properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1 v8 c1 v9 c1 v10 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sainyamula kadhi pathivagu Yehovaa nee Nivaasamulu entho ramyamulu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehovaa mandiramu choodavalenani, naa Praanamentho aashatho sommasillenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jeevamu gala devuni darshincha naa Hrudayamu,naa shareera maananda keka veyu chunnadi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sainyamula Yehovaa naa raajaa nee bali, peetamu Noddane pitchu kalaku goollu dorikenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pillalu pettutaku vaana kovelaku gooti stalamu Dorikenu naa devaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee mandiramulo nundu vaaru dhanyulu, vaaru Nityamu ninnu sannuthinchedaru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee valana balamu nondu vaaru dhanyulu yaatra Maargamu lathi priyamulu vaariki{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vaaru baakaa loyalo badi velluchu daanini Jalamayamugaa cheyuduru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Tholakari vaana daani deevenalatho kappunu Vaaru balaabhi vruddi nonduchu velluduru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vaarilo prativaadu siyonu loni devuni Sannidhilo kanabadunu{/lang-eng}
